pages.text: llmwmnyn aladhin 'ahsanuu eibadat allah fa'ataeuh fima 'amr wnha, aljntu, waziadat elyha, wahi alnazar 'iilaa wajh allah taealaa fi aljnt, walmghfrt walrdwan, wala yaghshaa wujuhuhum ghbar wala dhlt, kama yulhiq 'ahl alnar. hwla' almtsfwn bhdhh alsfat hum 'ashab aljanat maakithun fiha abdana
